Technique: PAINTED ON STUCCO; GILDED; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Mummy mask
Description: Face and neck of a gilded mummy mask. The wig is black with pale yellow stripes. Brows and eyelids are painted blue.Chest decoration: only in relief. On the headband is an inscription, starting at the back to the left of the knot. The band is tied very realistically at the back of the head.
